greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (-1)^n*Sum_{d|n} (-1)^d*d^2.
reference: G. H. Hardy, Ramanujan: twelve lectures on subjects suggested by his life and work, AMS Chelsea Publishing, Providence, Rhode Island, 2002, p. 142.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Heekyoung Hahn, Convolution sums of some functions on divisors, arXiv:1507.04426 [math.NT], 2015.
formula: Logarithmic derivative of A224364. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 04 2013
Bisection: a(2*k-1) = A001157(2*k-1), a(2*k) = 4*A001157(k) - A050999(2*k), k >= 1. In the Hardy reference a(n) = sigma^*_2(n). - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 07 2017
Conjecture: Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ 7 * Zeta(3) * n^3 / 24. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 10 2018
program: (MAGMA) m:=60; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!( (&+[k^2*x^k/(1-(-x)^k): k in [1..m]]) )); // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 09 2018
xref: Cf. A321543 - A321565, A321807 - A321836 for related sequences.
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 11 2001
